item.name: Get as much as you can!
hint.auto.notEnoughBeacons: You did not get enough beacons yet. Get some more!
hint.auto.canYouDoBetter: Very good start. Try to get some more!
hint.auto.betterThanRequired: Wow! Better than expected... Go for even more!
hint.auto.allBeaconsCleared: Amazing you got all beacons! You're a pro!
